New Records: Tarik Skubal recorded his 200th strikeout of the season
Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal pitched a career-high 8 innings, allowing only 3 singles and 1 home run, and striking out 8
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of a crowd of 34,355 who came early to celebrate the 40-year anniversary of the 1984 World Series championship
Others: The Tigers won the game 2-1, improving their record to 69-68, and are now 6 losses behind the Twins for the final wild card spot
